name: lifi_bridge_executor
description: Seller-executed bridge/swap via LI.FI. Buyer transfers funds to executor first (ACP requiredFunds). Supports fromChain=base, toChain in {ethereum, arbitrum, polygon, bsc}. Optional: toToken for cross-chain swap (DEX+bridge aggregation).

token.description: Source token symbol on Base (MVP: USDC).

toToken.description: Destination token symbol on target chain (optional). If omitted, defaults to token (bridge only).

slippage.description: Slippage as decimal (0.005=0.5%) OR percent (0.5=0.5%). Default 0.5%.

dryRun.description: If true, only returns quote/txRequest without broadcasting.
